commit message: initial Material Design support (+ end of official Eclipse support)
will fix a possible crash (later, when this code will be reactivated)
support feeds with dates composed of a 2-digits year
BaseActivity.java: Add FLAG_DRAWS_SYSTEM_BAR_BACKGROUNDS to allow changing status bar color
themes.xml: Fix colorAccent so that widgets are visible

Merge pull request #174 from zhaofengli/master

Change the status bar color
remove checkbox and keep a smaller star to gain some place on the item
rewrite ActionBar/Menu/Drawer management (more simple + fix fullscreen bug)
use back the old SwypeRefreshLayout (the new one does not fit well the current UI).
do not display the default flym icon into the actionbar
fix a UI bug state when there is no network (always looks as refreshing the feeds)
use the new floating action button for the 'hide read' button
add the search button into the upper drawer bar
